    Bindul Bhowmik

      • notNullOrEmpty

        public static void notNullOrEmpty(String arg,

        name - Name of the argument

      • notNull

        public static <T> void notNull(T arg,
                               String name)
        Checks to make sure the argument object is not null.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the object
        Parameters:
        arg - The argument to check
        name - The name of the argument
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if expectation is not met (arg is null).
